post.author: Mat Richard
post.title: WebAPI2 and AngularJS, My best friends’ wedding
post.description: A week ago I did a small presentation on WebAPI and AngularJS for the Montreal .NET User Group and w
post.content:
A week ago I did a small presentation on WebAPI and AngularJS for the Montreal .NET User Group and we had a pretty great turnout:

The group was amazing and they had lots of good questions so we’re going to schedule a full session in our next season. Until then as promised here is the code and the slides from the presentation
